ask 
for help or 
advice.

The early weeks: you
want to use lubricating jelly the 
first	time		because	hormone	
changes may make your 
vagina feel drier than usual.
It might be some time before 
you want to have sex. Until 
then, you both may feel 
happier	finding	other	ways	of	
being loving and close. If you or 
your partner have any worries, 
discuss them with your GP or 
health visitor.
It is possible to get pregnant 
even if you have not started 
your periods again or if 
you are breastfeed
